article_title: Congressman Gets Emotional After Wolf Blitzer Defends Planned Parenthood
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: Planned Parenthood, Wolf Blitzer, Jason Chaffetz, cancer, CNN

og.description: Rep. Jason Chaffetz was in no mood Wednesday to be lectured by CNN’s Wolf Blitzer about Planned Parenthood. The Utah Republican, who lost both of his parents to cancer,... Read More
